00009 void TRoomManagement::testFetchAllRooms () {
00010   Room roomA (1, 1, 2);
00011   Room roomB (2, 1, 1);
00012 
00013   RoomManagement rm;
00014 
00015   rm.newRoom (roomA);
00016   rm.newRoom (roomB);
00017 
00018   vector<Room> rooms = rm.fetchAllRooms ();
00019 
00020   QVERIFY (rooms.size () == 2);
00021 }

00033

00055 void TRoomManagement::testNewRoom () {
00056   int roomNumber = 5;
00057 
00058   Room temp, room (roomNumber, 1, 2);
00059   RoomManagement rm;
00060 
00061   rm.newRoom (room);
00062   temp = rm.fetchRoom (roomNumber);
00063 
00064   QVERIFY (room.getRoomNumber () == temp.getRoomNumber () &&
00065            room.getRoomFloor ()  == temp.getRoomFloor ()  &&
00066            room.getCapacity ()   == temp.getCapacity ());
00067 }

00083 void TRoomManagement::testDeleteRoom () {
00084   int roomNumber = 5;
00085 
00086   Room room, temp;
00087   RoomManagement rm;
00088 
00089   room.setRoomNumber (roomNumber);
00090   rm.deleteRoom (room);
00091   temp = rm.fetchRoom (roomNumber);
00092 
00093   QVERIFY (room.getRoomNumber () != temp.getRoomNumber ());
00094 }

00121 void TRoomManagement::testCheckInData () {
00122   int error = 0;
00123 
00124   Room room;
00125   RoomManagement rm;
00126 
00127   room.setRoomNumber (error);
00128   room.setRoomFloor (error);
